name: R5-FamilyHistoryStatus-R4-FamilyHistoryStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 FamilyHistoryStatus into FHIR R4

element.display: All available related health information is captured as of the date (and possibly time) when the family member history was taken.

element.display: This instance should not have been part of this patient's medical record.

element.display: Health information for this family member is unavailable/unknown.

target.display: Health information for this family member is unavailable/unknown.
